features.title: Comprehensive HR Processes
features.subtitle: Complete HR management solution with 6 integrated processes
features.hr.title: HR Records
features.hr.desc: NFC-enabled ID card scanning, easy and accurate personnel information management.
features.attendance.title: Attendance Management
features.attendance.desc: Manage shifts, work hours, overtime, leave, and tardiness with flexible settings suitable for all businesses.
features.device.title: Time Clock Integration
features.device.desc: Connect with time clocks for data storage and calculations. Conveniently control time clock operations remotely from your phone.
features.payroll.title: Payroll
features.payroll.desc: Simple, fast, and accurate payroll processing. Automated salary calculations, taxes, and insurance with one touch.
features.gps.title: GPS Attendance
features.gps.desc: Location-verified attendance with high-accuracy facial recognition meeting all flexible attendance requirements.
features.ess.title: ESS - Employee Self-Service
features.ess.desc: Transparent approval workflow, diverse application types, managing connections between employees and management.
